analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha,
analyzed: na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha
adhipatiyā cha pe a vigate cha
